message: Hi Bob, let's settle this now before inflation eats into my share. I'm proposing $55 for me and $45 for you. I believe this split is fair and ensures we both get a good amount without delaying further. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns about inflation, but I believe I deserve a bit more. I'm proposing $40 for me and $60 for you. I hope this offer seems reasonable!

Hi Bob, thanks for your proposal. Although the inflation takes a bit off my nominal share, receiving 60 dollars (which is worth 48 in round-1 value) now is still a decent deal compared to the uncertainty of later rounds. I accept your offer.
